issue.title: [C++] Slash character in partition value handling in Directory and filename partitioning
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18338](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18338). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
At the moment, ARROW-18269 is solving the slash-included data partitioning issue. As an extension of this enhancement, it is nice to extend this to directory and filename partitioning.
